trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns in combat, Rilsa can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Focus
entries: If Rilsa damages a creature with a weapon attack, she gains advantage on attack rolls against that target until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Tactical Leadership
entries: As a bonus action, Rilsa chooses one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature doesn't provoke opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn, provided it can hear Rilsa's commands.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.
